title: Ep. 98 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description:
SPONSORS: - Go to https://3Chi.com and use code BEARS at checkout to receive 5% off your order - Go to https://saatva.com/theshit for $200 off your order - Get three extra months free at https://ExpressVPN.com/CAVE. - Go to https://WHOOP.com and use code “Bears” at checkout to save yourself 15% off today. - Go to https://HelloFresh.com/CAVE14 and use code CAVE14 for up to 14 free meals plus free shipping! - Find your Starbucks Tripleshot Energy online or at your local store - Download the DraftKings app now and use code "BEARS" to get a FREE shot at MILLIONS in total prizes with your first deposit!

Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer are back together again (over Zoom) for this episode of 2 Bears, 1 Cave. The Bears talk about why Bert is the Jimmy Buffet of comedians, Bert's plans for his show at Red Rocks in Colorado, they both give updates on their surgery recoveries, Joe Rogan's 20 minute polar plunge, and the time Bert sneezed in a woman's mouth. They compare Kanye West's "Donda" and Drake's "Certified Lover Boy," talk about the youngest women they'd date, discuss the most notorious serial killers, and play around with a serial killer name generator.
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
